Author: Veemonheim (forked from Blooym)
Name: Wholist Field Notes
Punchline: Session-based nearby player log with optional marking and copy-to-clipboard exports.
Description:
A Wholist-derived session log for nearby players.

Features:
- User-initiated scan sessions that keep a "seen this session" list even as players load/unload.
- Optional marking with local history (first marked, last seen, times seen) to reduce duplicate reporting.
- Customizable clipboard export templates (names-only, names+world, full template blocks).
- Lodestone helper: opens character search for name/world (no automatic lookups).
- Local-only storage with configurable auto-prune (default: 180 days).

Guardrails:
- No automated reporting or ticket submission.
- No in-game interaction automation (no tells/emotes/follow).
- Scanning runs only when explicitly started by the user.

Note: This plugin is limited to players currently loaded by your client at the time they are seen.
